Beachcomber:



Beachcomber turned to Fidgit, keeping his weapon lowered so as not to alarm 
her, turned so she can see the red Maximal isignia on his chest.  He looked 
to the others with him.  "We're loading up weapons.  Half the functioning 
Maximals are repairing the Ark, the other on perimeter guard.  I suggest you 
help with repairs."
